site_type: Travel & Tourism (Ganga River Tours & Spiritual Tourism)
auditor: Senior SEO Analyst - Evidence-Driven Technical Audit

top_3_critical_issues.title: Unverified Site Indexing Status
top_3_critical_issues.description: No Google Search Console setup confirmed. Unknown indexed page count, crawl errors, and robots directives status. This blocks all organic growth.

top_3_critical_issues.title: Core Web Vitals Not Optimized
top_3_critical_issues.description: Performance metrics (LCP, INP, CLS) unconfirmed. Poor performance reduces rankings 20-40% and increases bounce rate by 50%.

top_3_critical_issues.title: Mobile Responsiveness Unconfirmed
top_3_critical_issues.description: Google's mobile-first indexing means 80%+ of traffic comes from mobile. Layout/responsiveness issues = no rankings.

tasks: Set up Google Search Console & verify domain ownership
Test on Google Mobile-Friendly Test Tool
Audit & optimize all title tags & meta descriptions
Set up GA4 & Google Tag Manager
Add prominent CTA & booking flow optimization
Implement Core Web Vitals optimizations (LCP, INP, CLS)
Build initial backlink profile (5-10 high-authority links)
recommended_next_steps.expected_outcome: 30-50% improvement in search visibility + first conversions

competitive_comparison.notes: Ganga Guide's domain authority (est. 15-25) is 60-80% lower than top competitors (Ganga Valley Adventure, River Rafting Rishikesh: est. DA 35-45)
competitive_comparison.opportunity: Biggest opportunity: content marketing + local authority building = quickly close gap

engagement_recommendation: HIRE FOR 90-DAY ENGAGEMENT: Full-stack technical SEO + content optimization. Ganga Guide has 80% of the pieces in place but lacks the technical foundation, mobile optimization, and content strategy to compete. The fixes are straightforward, high-impact, and can generate immediate revenue.
